The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are missing and only body parts and flower feeding insects are all that's left. Each day the insects keep saving themselves from the heat of the Namib Desert and the search party seems to see a preacher falling in love with the search group.
